author: KevinMarquette
body: I noticed that the xUnit heading as rendered on GitHub was not displaying as a heading. I made some other whitespace adjustments to make my markdown linter happier while I was in there. It was looking for a return line around headings, lists, and code blocks.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
@KevinMarquette,
Thanks for having already signed the Contribution License Agreement. Your agreement was validated by Microsoft. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: FYI, the DSC resources have a test to verify all markdown have these issues fixed. (I'd recommend disabling some of the rules like line length)  Here:  https://github.com/PowerShell/DscResource.Tests/blob/dev/Meta.Tests.ps1#L533

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: LGTM, changes are all lint issues and one minor fromatting due to lint issues.

title: Corect xUnit heading and linting warnings
